Location.title: Old Cottage
Location.description: An old thatched cottage in a clearing in the woods.

Location.title: Forest Path
Location.description: This is a small path leading through the woods, next to a river running north to south to the west.

Location.title: Inside Cottage
Location.description: Here inside an old cottage is a kitchen with a window and a cooking range along one wall. There is a door on the east wall.

Location.title: Store Room
Location.description: A square shaped room with shelves along one wall and an area containing bags of coal. There is a door on the west wall

Location.title: Forest Path
Location.description: This is a small path leading through the woods

Location.title: Forest Clearing
Location.description: Here is a small clearing in the woods

Location.title: Cliff
Location.description: Here is a rocky outcrop above the wooded area below

Location.title: Large Rock
Location.description: You are standing on top of a large rock above a wooded area below

Location.title: Narrow Path
Location.description: You are standing on a narrow path running through the woods, next to a river

Location.title: Sunken Garden
Location.description: In the middle of this cirular clearing in the woods is a round sunken garden made from stone, with a rosebush growing in the middle.

Location.title: Fountain
Location.description: Here in in woods is a stone fountain, with a tall pillar behind a small basin

Location.title: Forest Trail
Location.description: Here a forest trail leads from the east, branching off to the south and northwest. A road leads north

Location.title: Outside Hut
Location.description: You are standing outside a forest hut, a single floor construction made out of rough timber

Location.title: Forest Hut
Location.description: You are standing inside a forest hut, with piles of straw and logs around.

Location.title: Pond
Location.description: A forest trail leads to a pond, filled with brackish water.

Location.title: Gate
Location.description: The road from the south lead a large set of gates, blocking the way any further when closed.

Location.title: Driveway
Location.description: A wide driveway leads from gates to the south, to a large building ahead to the north

Location.title: House Main Entrance
Location.description: Here the driveway ends at the bottom of a flight of steps leading up to doors leading into a large house

Location.title: Outside West Wing
Location.description: A path continues to the west along the western side of the great house

Location.title: Kitchen Garden
Location.description: Here to the western side of the house is a kitchen garden, with beds of vegetables and herbs, with a entrance to the house kitchen

Location.title: Side Path
Location.description: Here a path leads round the house to the northern side

Location.title: North Gate
Location.description: Here a road leads out of the grounds towards the edge of the woods

Location.title: The Way Home
Location.description: The path now leads to a road leading home.

Location.title: Grounds
Location.description: Here to the west of the house is a lawned area, with a path leading to an outbuilding

Location.title: Outbuilding
Location.description: You are standing inside an outbuilding, with shelves and wooden benches

Location.title: Outside East Wing
Location.description: A path leads to the east along the east wing of the large house

Location.title: Grotto
Location.description: The path finishes here in a hollow with a very small cave, with many crystals.

Location.title: Kitchen
Location.description: This is a well equipped kitchen with basins, pots and pans hangind, cupboards and several large tables

Location.title: Pantry
Location.description: This pantry has shelves lined with boxes and jars of food, along the other supplies.

Location.title: Great Hall
Location.description: Under a valuted ceiling, this long hall has windows along the south wall, and a horseshoe shaped set of tables with an ornate chair at the eastern end

Location.title: Entrance Hall
Location.description: With large doors to the south, and elegant furnishings, this spacious hall leads through doors east and west with a grand staircase leading up

Location.title: Landing
Location.description: With a grand staircase leading down, this hall is furnished with chairs and small tables, with corridors leading east and west

Location.title: Corridor
Location.description: This corridor leads to the east, with doors leading north, east and northeast

Location.title: Lord's Room
Location.description: This bedroom contains an ornate four poster bed, with a dressing table and several cupboards and wardrobes

Location.title: Guest Room
Location.description: This richly furnished room contains a four poster bed with green cloth and a number of cupboards and wardrobes

Location.title: Bathroom
Location.description: The bathroom contains a flushing toilet, pedistal sink and a free-standing white enamel bathtub

Location.title: Gallery
Location.description: On discplay in this long gallery are several oil paintings showing portraits and other subjects, with occasional tables and chairs

Location.title: Hidden Corridor
Location.description: A small corridor lit by a skylight leads to the north

Location.title: Staircase
Location.description: A flight of steps leads up from the corridor. The walls are painted a faded brown colour and bare boards cover the floor.

Location.title: Attic Room
Location.description: The stairs from below lead to a dusty attic room lit by a small window. There is a set of shelves along on wall, and a couple of boxes.

Location.title: Long Lounge
Location.description: This long room is richly furnished with chairs and sofas, with ornate tables and pictures on the wall.

Location.title: Drawing Room
Location.description: This smaller room has a number of comfortable chairs, with carved side tables

Location.title: Library
Location.description: The library contains many shelves, lined with books, with a desk and a chair.
